        public static int GetNumberOfBytesLeft(java.io.BufferedInputStream data)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Counts the number of bytes left in the inputstream by reading through all of them. Only supports files <= 2gb. NO BYTES ARE AVAILABLE AFTERWARDS.
